movies.title: Dui bu qi duo xie ni

biography.bio: Ching Wan Lau was born on February 16, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Mad detective (2007), La vie sans principe (2011) and Black Mask (1996). He has been married to Amy Kwok since 1998.
biography.name: Ching Wan Lau

biography.bio: Born in Taiwan, Qi Shu has won the prestigious Golden Horse Awards in Taiwan (regarded as the East Asian Oscars) for Best Supporting Actress. She has also received a nomination for Best Actress from the Golden Horse Awards. She appeared with Jackie Chan in the romantic comedy Gorgeous (1999) ("Gorgeous"). Her name is spelled in a variety of ways, including Hsu Qi, Hsu Chi, Qi Shu, and Shu Kei, and there are quite a few other variations on her name on foreign V.C.D.s, D.V.D.s, and internet sites.
biography.name: Qi Shu

biography.bio: Cecilia Yip was born on March 8, 1962 in Hong Kong as Si-Si Lee. She is an actress and producer, known for The Swordsman (1990), Hong Kong 1941 (1984) and Et là-bas, quelle heure est-il? (2001). She is married to Louis Tan.
biography.name: Cecilia Yip

biography.bio: Born in 1949 in Hong Kong, Dennis Chan Kwok-sun is the younger brother of actor-director Philip Chan. While still in school, Chan appeared with his band on a television variety show and was invited by a RTHK director to audition. He was accepted and performed regularly in TV dramas in the 1970s. In 1977, he became producer for variety shows. He first acted in film in Cop and Robbers (1979), followed by over 90 films, mostly in cameos. He starred in Krazy Kops (1981) and Romantic Fool (2007) and played major parts in Soul (1986), Cageman (1992) and the American film Kickboxer (1989) and its two sequels. Chan joined D&B in 1984 as Distribution Manager, leaving in 1987 to learn film production at Hollywood. Returning to the Hong Kong film industry, he worked primarily in producing, writing and directing. Films he produced or associate produced include The Wrong Couples (1987), Hearts to Hearts (1988), Naked Killer (1992) and Future Cops (1993). Chan often doubled as writer on films he produced, such as Remains of a Woman (1993), which was awarded Best Actress (for Carrie Ng) at the Golden Horse Awards, and Wild Horse from Shangri-La (2009). Chan directed his first film, Perfect Match, in 1989, a year in which he also released a second film, Maybe Next Time. He also directed the romance drama Love and Let Love (1998). In 1993, he became COO of Vehicle Of Light Film Company and in 1999, ran the China Culture Media Group Company, which produced programs on Chinese history and culture. Chan resumed film production in 2006, such as producing and writing Air Diary (2006), Wild Horse from Shangri-La (2007), Besieged City (2008) and directing The Romantic Fool (2007, which Chan also wrote), Wushu: The Young Generation (also co-wrote, 2008, co-director, Anthony Szeto) and 37 (2009).
biography.name: Dennis Chan

biography.bio: Chi Leung 'Jacob' Cheung was born on September 6, 1959 in Hong Kong. He is a director and actor, known for Battle of the Warriors (2006), Cageman (1992) and Beyond the Sunset (1989).
biography.name: Chi Leung 'Jacob' Cheung

biography.bio: Kar Lok Chin was born on August 6, 1965 in Hong Kong. He is known for his work on Lust, Caution (2007), The Legend of Drunken Master (1994) and Cold War (2012). He has been married to Angela Ying-Ying Tong since November 13, 2012. They have two children.
biography.name: Kar Lok Chin

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Freebe Fong is known for her work on One Nite in Mongkok (2004), 2 Young (2005) and Drink-Drank-Drunk (2005).
biography.name: Freebe Fong

biography.bio: To-Hoi Kong is known for his work on As Tears Go By (1988), Fallen Angels (1995) and Days of Being Wild (1990).
biography.name: To-Hoi Kong

biography.bio: Guy Lai is an actor and producer, known for 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996), Twin Dragons (1992) and Long feng zhi duo xing (1984).
biography.name: Guy Lai

biography.bio: Bosco Lam is an assistant director and director, known for Push (2009), A Chinese Torture Chamber Story (1994) and Fung lau 3 chong si (1998).
biography.name: Bosco Lam

biography.bio: Terence Lam is an actor, known for Needing You... (2000) and Dui bu qi duo xie ni (1997).
biography.name: Terence Lam

biography.bio: Annabelle Lau is known for her work on Peace Hotel (1995), Bu yi tang de ma ma (1995) and Ai qing jia you zhan (1994).
biography.name: Annabelle Lau

biography.bio: Sun-Yan Lee is an actor, known for Dui bu qi duo xie ni (1997).
biography.name: Sun-Yan Lee

biography.bio: Benny Li Shuan Yan is an actor and writer, known for Biao jie, ni hao ye! xu ji (1991), Brothers (2007) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! 4 zhi qing bu zi jin (1994).
biography.name: Benny Li Shuan Yan
